key_risks: Regulatory and legal risks due to class action lawsuit and policy dependency

controversies: Class action lawsuit alleging securities violations
Customer complaints documented by Better Business Bureau and ConsumerAffairs
environmental_issues: Dependence on limited suppliers for solar panels and batteries
social_issues: Customer dissatisfaction with billing and service responsiveness
governance_issues: Allegations of misleading investors in the class action lawsuit
